name: 0012: Enums help
expected:
usage: lngs enums <source> -o <file> [-h] [-v] [--color <when>] [-r]

Creates header file from message file.

positional arguments:
 <source>       sets message file name to read from

optional arguments:
 -o <file>      sets C++ header file name to write results to; use "-" for standard output
 -h, --help     shows this help message and exits
 -v, --verbose  shows more info
 --color <when> uses color in diagnostics; <when> is 'never', 'always', or 'auto'
 -r, --resource instructs the Strings type to use data generated by the `lngs res'.
